name: @indoomni/strapi-plugin-firebase-admin
description: Wrapper for Firebase Admin Node.js SDK library to be used with Strapi apps.

strapi.name: kafkajs
strapi.description: Wrapper for Firebase Admin Node.js SDK library to be used with Strapi apps. Supply a valid Google Firebase credentials (JSON) file. As of time of writing, implemented functionality is push notification.
strapi.displayName: Strapi Firebase Admin Node.js SDK library wrapper

author: Iman Sjamhudi <indoomni@gmail.com>
